snippet: A mother describes the lack of physical activity in her Brooklyn school district.
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''School Breakfast, the New Food Fight,'' by Mark Bittman (column, nytimes.com, May 1), about school breakfast and obesity, made me think of my recent tours of public schools in my Brooklyn school district (22); my son will be entering kindergarten in the fall and scored well on the recent gifted and talented test.
